name: Castle Safety Limited
overview:
Castle Safety Ltd. is one of the leading specialist Health & Safety Solutions providers in Ireland, with its consultants advising clients from a wide range of industry sectors and organisations of all sizes. These include property and facilities management, food and retail, construction, mining and tunnelling, waste management, utilities and energy, transport, manufacturing, and national and local government.

Castleâ€™s professional consultants have over 60 years of combined experience throughout a variety of industries and provide the same energetic approach to Health & Safety matters - from Accident Investigations to Manual Handling Training â€“ irrespective of the size of the organisation.

PSDP & PSCS. Castle Safety can provide solutions in relation to the requirements of the Project Supervisor Design Process (PSDP) & Project supervisor Construction Stage (PSCS) as contained in the Safety, Health & Welfare (Construction) Regulations, 2006 which have expanded the definition of designers in relation to construction projects.

Mining & Tunnelling. Castle Safety Ltd. is the only major Health & Safety Consultancy Company in Ireland with a recognised specialist Mining & Tunnelling consultancy base. Our consultants have worked for some of the worldâ€™s largest mining and resource companies and have delivered unprecedented Health & Safety results to these companies. Our consultants have between them over 40yrs experience in the mining and tunnelling industry, and as a result can offer a level of service unmatched in the Irish market.

Castle Safety Ltd. specialises in delivering on-site safety advice on a short or long term basis. Castle Safety can assist you in implementing a comprehensive health and safety management system to suit your needs. Depending on your companiesâ€™ requirements, Castle Safety Ltd. can tailor a package that meets your individual needs.
